name: Dream A Little Dream
description: One peaceful dreamy night, the Royal Floof sipped too much strawberry milk and fell into a deep sleep. As the moon descended and the sun began to rise, the Royal Floof began to dream a little dream and rolled out of bed, falling into the twilight sky. Enter a dreamy land with this nostalgic arcade - style pixel art slice of heaven. Drift through the cotton candy colored clouds as a sleeping cat equipped with only the most magical of sleeping caps, and Dream a Little Dream.
